keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supporting a People's vote to give local people a final say between a credible deal and remain. Continues to campaign for remain.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: End the cuts to schools and our NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investing an extra £70 bn for Scotland.
With a Green New Deal creating high skilled, high wage jobs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect our place in the UK
keyPolicies.policyDescription: By opposing IndyRef2 and focusing on recovery of public services.

mentions.candidate: Local champion Nick Chisholm is standing for Labour
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Boris Johnson, SNP or Lib Dems
mentions.tacticalSituation: There is no route to a Labour Government if you SNP or Lib Dems. The only way to get the Tories out of Number 10 is to vote Labour.

issues.brexitEurope: End the Brexit uncertainty by supporting a People's vote to give local people a final say between a credible deal and remain.
issues.environment: Tackle climate change with a Green New Deal
issues.health: End the cuts to ... our NHS

leaflet.personalStatement: Nick has lived in Dumfriesshire for over 20 years and is a champion for local schools.

images.caption: Nick Chisholm with supporters, campaigning for real change.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Nick worked on a range of local environmental projects, helping tackle climate change and creating jobs in the area. He criticized the current MPs for leading the locality into more constitutional chaos.
